c74object.name: mc.wgMesh
c74object.digest: Create a wave guide mesh delay network with various construction algorhyhtms
c74object.description: Create a wave guide mesh with various algorhyhtms. These include a cartisian and polor mesh.

inlet.digest: MC audio. Should match the number of junctions in the mesh.

outlet.digest: MC audio. Mesh output for each scattering junction.

method.name: filterGraph
method.digest: Sets a filterGraph for all scattering junctions and walls

method.name: wallFilterGraph
method.digest: Sets a filterGraph for all walls

method.name: scatterFilterGraph
method.digest: Sets a filterGraph for all scattering junctions

method.name: scatterFiltersEnabled
method.description: Comunicates with a cascade~ using the bypass parameter

method.name: wallFiltersEnabled
method.description: Comunicates with a cascade~ using the bypass parameter

method.name: meshScript
method.digest: Sends messages to the internal JS object
method.description: mesh script functions include: makeCartMesh(length, width) makePolarMesh(out, around) cartMeshDt(length, width, centerDelay, deviation, wallDelay, wallPosL, wallPosR, wallPosT, wallPosB) polarMeshDt(out, around, outDt, outDev, aroundDt, aroundDev, wallDt)

attribute.name: meshDefinition
attribute.digest: Definition of the mesh. Type Size Size (default: cartisian 4 4)
attribute.description: Types of meshes: cartisian length width, polar out around

attribute.name: scatterRc
attribute.digest: Reflection coeficent between each scattering junction (default 0.4)
attribute.description: Best to use a value under 0.9

attribute.name: wallRc
attribute.description: Best to use a value under 0.9

attribute.name: randomDelayDepth
attribute.description: Smaller numbers will result in less pitch shifting

attribute.name: randomDelaySpeed
attribute.digest: frequency at which random delays are changed (default 0.001 0.01)
attribute.description: One number sets a fixed speed, two set a range

attribute.name: filtersEnabled
attribute.digest: Turns on or off all biquad filters in the mesh (default 0)
attribute.description: This chan be changed after instanciatoin. If no filter graph is attached, turning this on will result in no output
